fields.label: Allow Linking to Appointment Request Forms?
fields.name: appointment_request_query_system
fields.instructions: Grant the ability at the page level to display a link or dropdown to one or more online appointment request forms.

sub_fields.name: appointment_request_btn_text_system
sub_fields.label: Button Text for Appointment Request Forms
Standalone Heading for Appointment Request Forms on Location Profiles
sub_fields.name: appointment_request_location_heading_standalone_system
sub_fields.instructions: This heading text will be used when appointment request forms section is the only appointment option displayed.

sub_fields.name: appointment_request_location_descr_standalone_system
sub_fields.label: Standalone Description for Appointment Request Forms on Location Profiles
sub_fields.instructions:
This description text will be used when appointment request forms section is the only appointment option displayed.
This paragraph introduces the dropdown for selecting an appointment request form.
The paragraph should briefly describe what the user can do.
sub_fields.default_value: Appointments for specialized care at this location cannot be scheduled online. For those, submit a request for an appointment.
sub_fields.placeholder: Appointments for specialized care at this location cannot be scheduled online. For those, submit a request for an appointment.

sub_fields.label: Nested Heading for Appointment Request Forms on Location Profiles
sub_fields.name: appointment_request_location_heading_nested_system
sub_fields.instructions: This heading text will be used when UAMS Health MyChart Open Scheduling section is also displayed.

sub_fields.name: appointment_request_location_descr_nested_system
sub_fields.label: Nested Description for Appointment Request Forms on Location Profiles
sub_fields.instructions:
This description text will be used when other appointment options are also displayed.
This paragraph introduces the dropdown for selecting an appointment request form.
The paragraph should briefly describe what the user can do.
sub_fields.default_value: Some appointments at this location involve specialized care and cannot be scheduled online. For those, submit a request for an appointment.
sub_fields.placeholder: Some appointments at this location involve specialized care and cannot be scheduled online. For those, submit a request for an appointment.

sub_fields.label: Standalone Heading for Appointment Request Forms on Provider Profiles
sub_fields.name: appointment_request_provider_heading_standalone_system
sub_fields.instructions: This heading text will be used when appointment request forms section is the only appointment option displayed.

sub_fields.name: appointment_request_provider_descr_standalone_system
sub_fields.label: Standalone Description for Appointment Request Forms on Provider Profiles
sub_fields.instructions:
This description text will be used when appointment request forms section is the only appointment option displayed.
This paragraph introduces the dropdown for selecting an appointment request form.
The paragraph should briefly describe what the user can do.
sub_fields.default_value: Appointments for specialized care with this provider cannot be scheduled online. For those, submit a request for an appointment.
sub_fields.placeholder: Appointments for specialized care with this provider cannot be scheduled online. For those, submit a request for an appointment.

sub_fields.label: Nested Heading for Appointment Request Forms on Provider Profiles
sub_fields.name: appointment_request_provider_heading_nested_system
sub_fields.instructions: This heading text will be used when UAMS Health MyChart Open Scheduling section is also displayed.

sub_fields.name: appointment_request_provider_descr_nested_system
sub_fields.label: Nested Description for Appointment Request Forms on Provider Profiles
sub_fields.instructions:
This description text will be used when other appointment options are also displayed.
This paragraph introduces the dropdown for selecting an appointment request form.
The paragraph should briefly describe what the user can do.
sub_fields.default_value: Some appointments with this provider involve specialized care and cannot be scheduled online. For those, submit a request for an appointment.
sub_fields.placeholder: Some appointments with this provider involve specialized care and cannot be scheduled online. For those, submit a request for an appointment.
